headline.main: BYRD SCORES SOWERS OF SEEDS OF DISUNITY; Admiral Asserts They Are 'True Warmongers' Who Weaken Us

lead_paragraph: The true "warmongers" of the United States are those who sow the seeds of disunity within the nation and weaken its faith in democratic institutions, making it "ripe for invasion" from abroad, Rear Admiral Richard E. Byrd said last night in an address over a Columbia Broadcasting System network.
